summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue South, Sixteenth Avenue South and Seventeenth Avenue South, each from Beacon Avenue to Hanford Street; Hanford Street, from Fifteenth Avenue South to Beacon Avenue; and Beacon Avenue, from Hanford Street to Bayview Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 588 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
